姑.definition: paternal aunt; husband's sister; husband's mother (old); nun; for the time being (literary)

姑夫.definition: father's sister's husband; husband of paternal aunt; uncle

姑奶奶.definition: paternal great-aunt (father's father's sister); (respectful form of address for a married woman used by members of her parents' family) married daughter; (brassy self-reference used by a woman in an altercation) I; me; this lady here; (coll.) form of address for an unmarried girl or woman, expressing affection or reproach

姑妄言之.definition: to just talk for the sake of talking

姑娘.definition: girl; young woman; young lady; daughter; paternal aunt (old); CL:個|个[ge4]

姑婆.definition: grandfather's sister; sister of a woman's father-in-law

姑息.definition: excessively tolerant; to overindulge (sb); overly conciliatory; to seek appeasement at any price

姑息養奸.definition: to tolerate is to nurture an evildoer (idiom); spare the rod and spoil the child

姑父.definition: father's sister's husband; husband of paternal aunt; uncle

姑爺.definition: son-in-law (used by wife's family); uncle (husband of father's sister)

姑置勿論.definition: (idiom) to put (an issue) to one side for the moment
